properties.name: Vol. 6. Plate, M. [Map bound by Grand St., Seventh St., Broadway, S. Sixth St., East River; Including S. First St., S. Second St., S. Third St., S. Fourth St., S. Fifth St., River St., First St., Second St., Third St., Fourth St., Fifth St., Sixth St.]
properties.description: from Detailed estate and old farm line atlas of the city of Brooklyn : complete in six volumes ... from official records, private plans, and actual surveys ... / by G.M. Hopkins, C.E.
